description:
******** For a limited time $9 ONLY ********

This course is proper for who is beginner or even expert in some part. Because I will show you most of useful trick and methods to design and manage a text includes everything you need in it.

If you are an academic person, and you need to manage your text as an article or a thesis, you are in the right place!

Yes! You can learn how to perform whatever you need to set your texts up easily, in the shortest time, and in the best form and design.

No need to spend a lot of time to find someone and pay money each time to set your texts.

In this series, you will learn how to use Microsoft Word easily and fast.

You can set up your page, make titles and subtitles. You can design your text in paragraph and different styles, and use bullets and numbering in the easiest method.

You will know how to insert and edit a picture and table.

Also you will learn how to use symbols and write formulas based on your needs.

You can add footnotes, abbreviations and references in your text.

At the end of this course, you will be a professional user of Microsoft word .This 90 minutes course can open new doors to your future success.

Break the routine rules of using Microsoft word and learn the small, useful tips to utilize this software more applicable and comprehendible.
title: Word 2016 for Windows! Easy, Fast and Complete one
